text: I think uh one of the things that we've done that led to the success of our operation Far and Away the one thing I did for the success of this operation one of the most important things we've done to make our operation succeed is this has to be the success to our operation hi I'm buz Clute scientist and I want to let you in on a little secret the best education that I've received in the last 15 years has been from producers like you today's topic is about the secret to successful operations we've been talking to Progressive farmers and ranchers across South Dakota and here's what Rancher AJ hes has to say the one thing I have done to the success of this operation that I would say benefited the most would definitely be the rotational system it absolutely helped with the grass it made the soil better it it made us run 40% more cattle it cheapened up our daily cost of grazing the producer has spoken and the professor has been schooled
